Job Description: Job Description      Design, develop, and maintain new and existing code    Write readable, extensible, testable code with good performance requirements.    Write and maintain technical documentation for new and existing features.    Keep uptodate on best coding practices and new technologies.    Contribute in discussion with team lead and client meetings to analyze requirements.    Should be able to manage functional expectations while deciding on technical solutions    Advanced problem-solving skills and strong analytical design skills.    Responsibility for designing, coding, testing, bug resolving, software deployment, tracking the    product through its lifecycle, and communication with the internal teams are also included.      Primary skills      Strong understanding of OOPs principles   C#, WPF    Web service/web API    .Net Framework 4.5 and above    Visual Studio 2013/15 and above   XML, JSON    Async functionality    Work experience in VSTO is a plus    ASP.NET, HTML5, CSS2, JavaScript    Version control with Git    Fluent design experience      Secondary skills      Good verbal written communication    Good in teamwork as well as an individual contributor    Must be able to contribute to productivity in a short time.
